      static TurnAction TurnAction.createMoveAction(TurnAction.Direction direction, int numSteps)
      Creates a move action.
      static TurnAction TurnAction.createNothingAction()

      static TurnAction TurnAction.createShootAction(float angle)
      Creates an action to shoot

      Creates an action to shoot
      TurnAction Tank.onTurn(Battlefield field, MapPoint position, float health)
      Called on each of this tank's turns to recieve a TurnAction for this tank Create a TurnAction with
      createNothingAction(),
      createShootAction(float), or
      createMoveAction(zove.ppcg.tankwar.TurnAction.Direction, int)
